item.title: 2012 - [ t h e m o v i e ] ;
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

There are a few ways the world will end, but they will take a long time to take effect.

  1. The moon will finaily get so far way it will have no effect on earth, this will cause many things to be disrupted sciences say it could cause the earth to end.

  2. The big bright star that we wake up to everyday (the sun) will burn out. this will cause many things to be disrupted also, most likely causing earth to end.

  3. We will slam into Andromeda (the closest galaxy to the milky way). This will cause well… death to anything really in both galaxy’s.

  4. A big huge rock, yes this could cause massive devastation but we many survive.

  5. Nuclear war, a war between all the nations resulting in death to all really, they estimate that it will most likely happen because of an accidental. Meaning someone will thing they are being attacked and send an attack back creating a domino effect resulting a massive war really.

  6. The center of the earth stop rotating, this will cause many disruptions. But I am not sure if it will ever happen, the core is liquid I don’t think it will stop moving.

  7. I can’t think of anything else right now. :P, but when the earth ends we will know how but will most likely not stop it and everything will be recreated in different ways and a new life form will be made. But until this day I am fine with knowing I have lived another day.

Read full topic
